Comment: Yes. Trump was ["waiting for Xi to call"](https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/world/trump-is-waiting-for-xi-to-call-the-chinese-see-it-differently/ar-AA1CHgUD). Didn't happen.  Trump's strategy this term has been 1) apply pain to somebody, 2) wait for them to suck up, 3) remove pain. That's become his standard strategy for almost everything.  Trump's bullying isn't working at all outside the US:  * Trump tried to bully Ukraine. Zelenskyy stood up to him. EU is now working on ways to become less dependent on the US. **LOSER**. * Trump tried to bully Canada. The "51st state" nonsense was laughed at by everybody. Tariff threats made it clear that the US needs Canada's imports more than Canada needs to export to the US. Premier of Canada refused to be bullied. Trump backed down. **LOSER**. Canada and China are now in early discussions about exporting oil to China instead of the US.  * Trump tried to bully Denmark over Greenland. World reaction was laughter. Denmark didn't back down. **LOSER**. Vance visited old US base in Greenland. Accomplished nothing.  * Trump tried to bully the European Union. Not much happened. Trump backed down. **LOSER.** * Trump tried to bully China over tariffs. China mostly ignored him. Trump backed down once told that the US needs China's imports. **LOSER**.  And that's where we are today.
